thread.section_title: E&S Pkwteile GmbH Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von E&S Pkwteile GmbH | pkwteile.de
thread.title: Kevin Emanuelsson
thread.title_full: E&S Pkwteile GmbH bewertet von Kevin Emanuelsson

author: Kevin Emanuelsson
title: Kevin Emanuelsson
text: It all started when I wanted new engine parts for my Mercedes engine. I ordered all my parts, paid for them (stupid move) and after two weeks the items were delievered. I got my main bearings, rod bearings and gasket set to the wrong car. I sent them back at MY cost and now they tell me I can't get my money back. I must buy parts for the remaining money (240Euro). This company is the worst i have ever come in contact with and I would never EVER recommend this site to anyone! This is not legal to do!
